title: Bonefeel (+Weird)
description: At the beginning of the session, roll+Weird.

outcomes.text: Hold 1 (+1). At any time, either you or the MC can spend your hold to have you already be there, with the proper tools and knowledge, with or without any clear explanation why. **You also take +1 forward**.
As above but do not take +1 forward.
The MC holds 1, and can spend it to have you be there already, but somehow pinned, caught or trapped.

title: Custom ride
description: You get a car. You made it yourself, or had it made to your own specs (you detail). You also get **behind the wheel**.

title: The mind's fraying edge
description: You have one piece of Brain-picker gear. Get with the MC to choose what it is. You also get +1Ψ (max 3-Ψ).

title: Oftener right
description: When another player's character comes to you for advice, tell them what you honestly think the best course is. If they do it, they take +1 to any rolls they make in the doing, and you mark 1Xp.

title: Things speak (+Weird)
description: Whenever you handle or examine something interesting (your call), roll+weird.

bullets: Who handled this last before me?
What strong emotions have been most recently nearby this?
What words have been said most recently nearby this?
What has been done most recently with this, or to this?
What's wrong with this, and how might I fix it?

outcomes.text: Treat a miss as though you've **opened your brain to the world's psychic maelstrom** and missed the roll.
